TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: 在你的回合结束时，对其他所有牌手和他们控制的生物造成1+X点伤害。X等同于你坟场数量的五分之一（小数舍去）。
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.FILTER: local filter = ClearFilter() filter:Add( FE_TYPE, OP_IS, CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:Add( FE_CONTROLLER, OP_NOT, EffectController())
local filter = ClearFilter() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:Add( FE_PLAYER_INSTANCE, OP_NOT, EffectController())
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = ClearFilter() filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, EffectController() ) local n = filter:Count() local damage = 1+math.floor(n/5) if EffectSource() ~= nil then EffectSourceLKI():DealDamageTo( damage, FilteredCard() ) end

local filter = ClearFilter() filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, EffectController() ) local n = filter:Count() local damage = 1+math.floor(n/5) if EffectSource() ~= nil then EffectSourceLKI():DealDamageTo( damage, FilteredPlayer() ) end
